name: ZARA Redesign UI kit
description: ZARA.COM REDESIGN CONCEPT. FOR PEOPLE, NOT FOR FASHION. My attempt to improve customer interaction with the site. Make it simple, clean & minimal, but save creative and general brand message. I developed wireframes, thought out design, made an animation for it. Of course, I didn't forget about the adaptive, mobile devices and other resolutions. It's about web-design, UX/UI design & motion. Zara provides fashionable clothes and luxury clothing
